title: Con D. Oriano - Secret Member of the Will of D
theory: Condoriano (Shepherd) is actually 'Con D. Oriano,' a secret member of the Will of D clan, and his appearance in the G-8 Arc was foreshadowing for major future events. Fans jokingly claim he's the most powerful character in One Piece and the true 10th Straw Hat member who was left behind.
author: One Piece Fandom (Collective Meme)

title: The G-8 Arc Should Be Considered Canon
theory: Many fans theorize and wish that the G-8 Arc (including Episode 201) should be considered canon material due to its high quality, character development, and seamless integration with the main story. The arc's excellent writing, Jonathan's compelling character, and memorable moments like Condoriano make it feel more authentic than typical filler content.
author: One Piece Community (Reddit)

title: Vice Admiral Jonathan Could Return as an Ally
theory: Some fans theorize that Vice Admiral Jonathan's reasonable and honorable nature shown throughout the G-8 Arc (including his tactical respect for the Straw Hats in Episode 201) could lead to him returning in the canon story as an ally during a major Marine conflict, possibly during the final war. His character differs from typical corrupt or extreme Marine antagonists.
author: Various One Piece Theorists

title: G-8 Arc Should Be Included in Netflix Live Action
theory: Fans have theorized and advocated that Netflix's live-action One Piece adaptation should include the G-8 Arc (Episodes 196-206 including Episode 201) as canon material, given its quality and character development. The arc's tactical battles and character moments would translate well to live-action format.
author: One Piece Netflix Fans
